attributes.action: Guilty rioters? - Send them to military school.
attributes.additional_details:
Alternative petitions (i.e. remove benefits) suggest punishments for the rioters of August 2011 that take something away from the guilty parties.
We should not take something away, we should give them something. That something is the respect for authority and society that, thanks in part to the parents, the rioters do not have.
If we send them to jail they will simply come out 6 weeks later even more disillusioned of and disaffected by society. Additionally, the cost to the taxpayer would be enormous.
Therefore, spending that money on educating those guilty parties through military schools, rather than putting them through a prison system that doesn't work, is advised.
